scripts.test: npm run test:build && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const dir='dist-tests/src/assets/icons';fs.mkdirSync(dir,{recursive:true});['online','offline'].forEach((name)=>fs.writeFileSync(path.join(dir, name + '.svg?raw'), 'module.exports = \"<svg></svg>\";'));" && node --test dist-tests/tests
